name: Dine & Dash (smartinrub)
description:
Dine & Dash is an infinite runner that allows the player to scape into a world full of obstacles and power ups. The player is running away from an angry waiter. The game starts in a typical Spanish street full of terraces, and as the game progress, the environment gets more and more overwhelming.

Philosophy

This game is inspired in the street culture which consist in not paying the bill in a restaurant just for fun. Therefore, we are making our character an anti-hero, in other words, a thief. By doing this, we hoped to create an exciting player experience filled with adrenaline and rush.

Why create the game?

We wanted to create a game which is easy to play and accesible to a large audience, but with an unique theme, so we located the game in a city of Spain named Málaga.
